message:
***Update*** FoundSafe!
MISSING PERSONS FROM PINE JUNCTION AREA COLORADO⠀
Urgent! Help Needed!⠀
Help is needed in finding these two girls. They were last seen July 7, 2019 at 10:00PM in the area of Mount Evans Boulevard in Pine Junction, CO. The two girls are not related but may be together. They both are from out of state. If you see them or have any information, please call 911 immediately. ⠀
#MISSING #PleaseShare #PineJunctionCO #ShermanTX #Idaho #prayforemma #prayforanna #Denver #Colorado
